participant_1.background:
I am shorter than most people in my city, but I am tall enough to enjoy vintage furniture.
i like to go to the opera.
I have a Windows computer because it is compatible with my third-party PDF reader.
I have the best dogs in the world and I would brag about them to my friends if I was famous.
i like to go to the farmer s market every weekend.

participant_2.background:
I am 150 lbs, but I am not a stickler for my weight.
i just bought my first home.
I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon.
I live a very active life, but I always make time for my family.
i also like ice cream.

content.text: I am so glad to hear that you just bought a home! Congrats!
Thank you so much! It's a big change, but I'm excited about it.
I bet it is! It's a big step. What's the biggest change you've noticed since moving in?
I guess I have to do a lot more housework now! But it's worth it.
I bet! Do you have a favorite part of your new home?
I love the backyard. It's perfect for entertaining guests and my dogs love to run around in it.
That sounds awesome! I love spending time in my backyard, too. It's so relaxing.
Me too! I love sitting outside on a nice day and just enjoying the peace and quiet.
It's the best. I'm so glad you're happy with your new home!
